reference.shortdesc: The subjectRole element specifies a cell in a subject relationship table. A cell in a subject relationship table is a group of one or more subjects that are related to subjects in other cells of the same row.

section.title: Usage information
section.p: A subject-relationship table cell does not imply a relationship between topics or resources that are referenced in the same cell, unless the collection-type attribute set on the cell indicates that they are related.
When used within the subjectRelHeader, the subjectRole element defines the type of subject or the relationship provided by the column.

section.title: Specialization hierarchy
section.p: The subjectRole element is specialized from relcell. It is defined in the subject scheme module.

section.title: Attributes
section.p: The following attributes are available on this element: , scope, format, and type.
